input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Analysis Dashboard Dear Customer Support,
This email concerns an issue with our data analysis dashboard. The dashboard is behaving unexpectedly and we are unsure of the cause.
We suspect that the problem might be due to incompatible software updates or faulty data.
To date, we have attempted to restart the servers and check the database connections, but the issue persists.
We would be grateful if you could look into this issue and provide us with a potential solution as soon as possible.
Please contact us if you need any additional information.
We appreciate your support and look forward to your response.. My contact number is +86-10-8500-1234.
